00054 struct Point3D;
00055 struct Vector3D;
00056 struct Normal;
00057 struct Ray;
00058 struct BBox;
00059 
00060 class Transform 
00061 {
00062 public:
00063         Transform( );
00064         Transform( const SoTransform& coinTransform );
00065         Transform( double mat[4][4] );
00066         Transform( const Ptr<Matrix4x4>& mdir );
00067         Transform( const Ptr<Matrix4x4>& mdir,  const Ptr<Matrix4x4>& minv );
00068         Transform( double t00, double t01, double t02, double t03,
00069                double t10, double t11, double t12, double t13,
00070                    double t20, double t21, double t22, double t23,
00071                    double t30, double t31, double t32, double t33 ); 
00072         Transform( const Transform& rhs );
00073 
00074         Transform Transpose() const;
00075         Transform GetInverse() const ;
00076         Point3D operator()( const Point3D& point ) const;
00077         void operator()( const Point3D& point, Point3D* transformedPoint ) const;
00078         Vector3D operator()( const Vector3D& vector ) const;
00079         void operator()( const Vector3D& vector, Vector3D* transformedVector ) const;
00080         Normal operator()( const Normal& normal ) const;
00081         void operator()( const Normal& normal, Normal* transformedNormal ) const;
00082         Ray operator()( const Ray& ray ) const;
00083         void operator()( const Ray& ray, Ray* transformedRay ) const;
00084         BBox operator()( const BBox& bbox  ) const;
00085         void operator()( const BBox& bbox, BBox* transformedBbox  ) const;
00086         Transform operator*( const Transform& rhs ) const;
00087         bool SwapsHandedness( ) const;
00088         
00089         bool operator==( const Transform& mat ) const;
00090 
00091         Ptr<Matrix4x4> GetMatrix() const {return m_mdir;}
00092 
00093         friend std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& os, const Transform& tran );
00094          
00095 private:
00096         Ptr<Matrix4x4> m_mdir;
00097         Ptr<Matrix4x4> m_minv; 
00098 };
